articles.description: China on Wednesday kept its one-year loan prime rate unchanged at 3.7%, while also holding steady on the five-year LPR at 4.6%.

articles.title: Life with chronic kidney disease since 18: He was told he had 7 years to live – he's now in his active 50s - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Job Loei, 57, recalled the shock when he was diagnosed with the medical condition at a young age. But he has since spent 29 years and counting on dialysis and loving life. This is his story.
articles.content:
EXERCISE IS KEY

articles.title: NASA: Massive solar storm hits Earth, sparks VHF radio blackout in Asia, Australia - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA: A huge solar flare erupting on the surface of the Sun sent a solar storm towards the Earth on April 17. The solar storm was so strong that it caused radio blackouts.
articles.content: According to the US Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC), a powerful solar flare on the surface of the Sun caused radio blackouts in Asia and Australia. On Sunday, April 17, a solar flare peaked an… [+2172 chars]
